title: Photos capture just how much our phones disconnect us
text:
Photos capture just how much our phones disconnect us 
Published By: CultOfMac.com - Today 
Quick – how often do you check your iPhone when you’re around other people? When you’re out dining? At home on the couch, maybe watchi...
